definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Italian origin, derived from the Latin name 'Sergius', historically associated with ancient Roman gentes and later used in various European cultures.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自拉丁语 'Sergius' 的男性名，起源于意大利，历史上与古罗马氏族相关，后在欧洲多个文化中使用。
definitions.example_en: Sergio Ramos is one of the most celebrated defenders in football history.
definitions.example_cn: 塞尔吉奥·拉莫斯是足球史上最受赞誉的后卫之一。
